stories.text: Basically what the title says.  A work event for socializing with your team over zoom.  Somewhere between allowed and expected that you'd have a drink.  Would you smoke?  What would your reaction be if someone else did?
stories.title: Ask HN: Would you smoke weed on a virtual work happy hour?

stories.text:
A CLI I'm working on that creates boilerplates and templates for various languages/frameworks now supports Node.js.

https://github.com/utopiops/utopiops

In case of Node.js, at this early stage, it supports Express frameworks, creates the folder structure, mongoose, passport.js, sets up git, linting and testing tool.
stories.title: Show HN: A CLI to create your Node.js application's boilerplate
